column1: # This is the language file for user interaction.

column2: "Username used for login (keine Sonder Zeichen erlaubt)"
"Initial language for the user, can be changed by the user."
"Use LDAP for authentication, password set here is ineffective"
"User can enable Admin-Mode to show internal labels for items, attributes, etc."
"The password has to be at least 8 characters long..."
User assigned to records => deactivated successfully!
"Do you really want to activate this User?"
"Do you really want to delete this User?"
"User is allowed to enable Admin-Mode. If Admin-Mode is enabled the attribute-name instead of the attribute-description is displayed."
"Set up 2 Factor Authentication for your account"
"If you haven't already, install the Google Authenticator App"
"Tap 'Menu' and then 'Set up account'. Now either scan the code below or manually enter the secret"
"You have activated 2 Factor Authentication! At every login you will be required to enter the Code currently displayed in the Google Authenticator App"
"To finish the setup enter the 6-digit code displayed in the Google Authenticator App and press 'Verify Code'"
